title: Against Swain mid, we had Cait, Yasuo, and Lee Sin, guess who got mortal reminder?
body:
Me as AP tank {{champion:54}}.

Reminded all 3 of our AD champs that Swain would have a hard time out sustaining their damage with 800 gold. But nope, I gotta build it after 3 items and boots because it became obvious they weren't gonna do it. 

This is why {{champion:50}} and {{champion:36}} are gonna get hit, probably more than once with nerfs, people just not taking advantage of the tools at hand. People not doing the smart thing is why I can't have a good yellow trinket at level 9 anymore, I wonder what else will be lost because of it.

replies.body:
As an **ABILITY POWER** Tank, why not {{item:3165}} instead of building AD?

Why would you use an inferior tool?

That'd require getting him to 40%, I didn't have the AP to burst him that low since my build was tank, was more practical to apply it for 3-5 seconds with auto attacks at any HP than take the situational GW of morrello
welp at least the logic is there

This is why I hope they update {{item:3165}} for the Immobile mage update. give it something like 6-7 seconds of mortal wound every time you cast a spell on an enemy. Then again, I'm only saying make the effect longer for {{item:3165}} than on {{item:3033}} since normally abilities can't fire as fast as an AA... unless your {{champion:13}} .__.

> As an **ABILITY POWER** Tank, why not {{item:3165}} instead of building AD?

They have to be low enough for it to work.
And it lasts for half the duration and can only be applied when abilities aren't on cd at that.
And costs a lot more.

1) 800g compared to 2550g, if he gets it after 3 items, he can't really afford to wait for another 1750 more gold for GW, also delaying another tank item by 1750g more.
2) GW permanent as soon as you get into AA range compared to GW only once he's below 40% and, depending on the champ, with some cd.
Mundo has more problems than just his healing >_>

I'm really not sure that I could play him with the +max HP one since it would reduce my laning phase by quite a lot. Similarly, 2% damage reduction is pretty useless.

Mundo has more problem that his healing though.His damage are ridiculous to be honest.Back then that wasn't such a problem but with grasp+his E+titanic hydra,he can easily take off half your hp in 2 sec if you're playing a squischy.
Sure,he shouldn't hit you but you know things are not always perfect.Btw,the fact that he can just build health +resist and get so much damage out of it is really annoying.

Except those awkward moments where you ult someone and they die before the shield actually procs. And you have to wait for 2 minutes for it to come back...

Squish.

_Gottuh deeel the demegez. _(even tho LDR only does more dmg to high health targets up to  a cap. Good luck killing Mundo when he;s healing for 800/s) 

Ugh..>_>

Honestly people are just too lazy to do maths and too ingorant to build for their team. Even without calculation, if there is an item _that is specifically designed to punish sustain tanks hard_, it would make sense that it should be bought _to punish sustain tanks hard_.

The DPS meter mentality in LoL really baffles me, because this is not a game where you win by neat numbers and kill score, but by teamwork and adaptive strategy.

I can sort of understand why Lee wouldn't do that if he was going a more tanky oriented lee build (as fitting in the new mortal reminder would definitely hit his damage by a massive amount that it probably wouldn't even be worth it).

But Vayne.....or any other adc for that matter....I don't understand why they are so against building this item.  Hell it is even pretty decent against other ADCs as lifesteal is usually their only defense.
tbh, ex sucks. Spending 800 gold on that crap wont really be worth it till your third item ish, maybe fourth,

Yeah, changing your build a bit to negate an enemy champions' strong point really sucks. I mean, how will you top damage graphs if you don't rush Shiv? I bet you are one of those people that go 0/5 and still go full damage, never giving a thought about altering their build.

Got one better, one time I asked a GP to build Mortal Reminder, he said "alright."
A few minutes later he goes "Okay I got Mortal", I check his inventory: no Mortal. Not even a component that would lead to Mortal Reminder.
So naturally, I go "dude what". His answer bothers me to this day.
"Oh you meant the item?** I thought you meant the upgrade.**"

http://i.imgur.com/Ui7VTdW.png

I still have no idea what upgrade he was refering to. The closest I've gotten is Death's Daughter, which I guess could somehow, in some strange, twisted reality, be mistaken for "MORTAL REMINDER". Anyway, we lost the game a while later because he didn't build Mortal Reminder after that and just kinda ignored every call to buy it, even though he fed Vlad hard.

Same with me. There was Mundo in enemy team and I was telling my Tristana to build Executioner's Calling. After telling her that about 5 times, she asked me what it is. I explained to her that it makes auto attacks apply greavious wounds (I even compared it to ignite, in case she still didn't get what I mean).  She still went for Lord Dominik's Regards instead. Mundo has a huge win rate only because people are too dumb to think. EC was given quite nice build path, combining with Last Whisper, so it isn't a waste of an item slot like before. But nope, why care about building it, let's just complain how OP Mundo is.

As someone who had to build {{item:3123}} on {{champion:14}} because his ADC and jungler didn't know or want to build it (the {{champion:35}} really annoyed me due to it distracting him from his, "400 AD build") I can relate.

It's a sad day when the tank of the team needs to build an anti-tank item.

And this is why I play Mundo and Swain.  It is really disheartening that Riot killed Gunblade though.  A snowballing Swain with Gunblade so nice.  I would say though neither one needs a nerf.  You have to Survive an awful dueling and farming early game to crush as Mundo or swain.  In my Humble opinion that's reward earned.
How did they kill Gunblade?  It was buffed not nerfed.

Why don't you use WotA?

Plus 10% CDR is better than 40 AD for Swain
{{champion:24}}

The real problem seems to be people doing nothing but static builds still. It's a real problem. 
 I can't say much about it though, I still have the problem just not as badly.

> [{quoted}](name=Shadow Gilgamesh,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NEeu7bXA,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-12-01T05:01:49.908+0000)
>
> People not doing the smart thing is why I can't have a good yellow trinket at level 9 anymore...

I miss yellow trinket. I feel like the map is really vision-less now, even more so than last season.

As a regular mundo player I can tell that {{item:3123}} and {{item:3033}} really hurts.... The adc only needs to hit you once and then ignore you to render my ultimate useless.... I wish they would remove grievous wound so they could proper balance mundo ult. Currently is op without grievous wound and close to useless with it (ignite was manageable because it wasn't refreshed every aa, same with morelicom, you could ult at the begging of the fight and heal though out the battle)

I'm not sure why the hell people aren't willing to drop a small anount of gold into executioner's calling to stop the enemy team. 

And I'm also getting really pissed off at people's obsession with lord dominik's regards and +15% damage. That damage is miniscule when you're not penetrating base armor, and even more miniscule when the enemy has lifesteal/spellvamp/is mundo. More often than not, getting mortal reminder means you'll be doing MORE damage to the enemy team. People would be surpised how much just sustain is in the game, from lifesteal to regular heals to just standard sustain.

It true was getting stomped by Swain top-lane as Nasus built a exe.C and proceeded to roll through him. G.W. is very powerful people just don't get it cause they tend to only focus on the biggest DPS numbers

I think the issue here is Lord domonics is a better choice unless your enemy team is very reliant on self heal, many people will take up to 15% more damage to grievous since they think "Hey if its 1 or 2 people my AP teammates will deal with it and I can deal increased damage to the tanks"

People still don't seem to get that grievous helps dueling the other ADC

And then there's the time I was playing as a fed Tristana, build calling, and Mundo still healed through my damage.

I feel like Lord Dominick's Regards would have been overall more useful in that game, as I had more things to kill than just a goddamn supertank Mundo.

Should just delete the effect form items and make a Flask.

Flask will apply it to all forms of damage you do while the Flask is active. Also increases armor/MR by 15(maybe 20?). 

It's too niche of an effect to be tied to items IMO.

Why are people complaining about taking Executioner's? When I didn't have Executioner's (I was building Runaan's as Twitch) we were 4 man ganking top lane when Mundo had overextended to Tier 2 turret, and would almost make it back to Tier 1 with Anivia and Braum. When I built Mortal Reminder, we were able to have a much easier time taking care of that slobbery mess. Even easier when I also built Giant Slayer right after that. (Mundo was the only one who won laning). So plz, just 800 gold, that's 2 kills and couple of cs for a long sword and GW.

But - but you can stack Energize items!! That is so broken OP, we have to abuse that before Rito realizes how stupid they are! 
On a completely unrelated note, Mundo&co are way too freaking strong.

I saw the enemy team pick Mundo and Elise one time so I knew it would be top lane Mundo, I immediately lock in Trundle when its my pick turn and then start Longsword and B as soon as I have enough gold to finish EC and I work towards building Bork through the early game. Easy lane.
